nodes.text: Agnon was a human male officer who held the rank of First Lieutenant in the armed forces of the First Order. He used a TIE echelon to travel to Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the First Order's conflict with the Resistance, and was accompanied by a sergeant and several stormtroopers of the 709th Legion.

Agnon was created as part of the backstory for the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge theme park land, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. He first appeared in the comic Galaxy's Edge 1, written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published by Marvel Comics on April 24, 2019.
